name: 2021 4th International Conference on Electronics and Electrical Engineering Technology
content: Paper Publication: ACM Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8516-9): archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, or International Journal of Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Telecommunications (IJEETC, ISSN: 2319-2518): indexed in Scopus, Google Scholar, etc.
